p: Several cytokines (MCP1, IL10, KC, IL12p70, and IL6) were quantified in whole-lung homogenates from mice sacrificed on day 9 (48 h after N. meningitidis infection) in one part of the lung homogenates as mentioned above that was cleared by centrifugation at 5000 x g for 10 min at 4 °C and the supernatants used for cytokine assays using an ELISA kit (R&D Systems, Abcam®), according to the manufacturer’s instructions and the data were expressed in pg/ml of of total protein of the lungs as previously described [ 15].
